summary: A Flax implementation of the Wav2Vec2 architecture fine‑tuned for Connectionist Temporal Classification (CTC), enabling end‑to‑end speech‑to‑text conversion by processing raw audio waveforms into token logits.
business_intent: Offer a high‑performance, trainable speech recognition model for voice assistants, transcription services, and audio analytics platforms that require fast, scalable inference on JAX/Flax backends.
